name: Call Of Sniper
description:
The call of the army sniper shooting survival mission is to aim, shoot and eliminate the terrorists. The rule of this hunter survival game is to counter shoot the terrorist with extreme precision. The US American Navy Seal and Marine forces need a secret agent from an elite killer commando group to fight with them till the last day of the war. This impossible ops mission can only be completed if the top commando fights with the US Navy forces till the last day in the battleground. Hit the battleground with real sniper shooter skills. Fully equipped with night vision scope sniper guns, you can fight as a true hunter to win this amazing FPS shooting game. Such a deadly assault mission! Hunt them before they shoot you. Use your ultimate tactical sniper shooting simulator skills to kill the enemy and save the world. Carry out counter-terrorist strike mission in an ultimate first-person action shooter game as a secret agent commando hunter. Two years after retirement from the US Marines, Captain Luke Shaw, a well-decorated sniping legend of ww2 is asked to return to the front line for a special mission. After the WWII, The U.S government has recently encountered various problems worldwide that need instant addressing. Take to the skies and travel the world to complete a series of highly important missions. As a real agent of this task, you will be required to travel through time as well as overland through the mountain and deserts. So pack your kit and load your weapon, Captain Shaw is on his way back to the front line of duty. You are the last hope of this assault combat mission. Using your sniper gunshot to destroy the dangerous enemies with superb combat skills and unmatchable battlefield hero instincts. Make use of powerful weapons to damage terrorist enemy territory.

Lead the squad of elite army sniper commandos who are trained for accurate shooting and combat skills in the most challenging shooting game ever. Call of Army Sniper: Sniper Shooter Battleground is an amazing sniper game with real war games experience and realistic army shooter missions. Survival of your country is in your hands now. Your job is to save the threatened city and survive the shooting to win the war against terrorism. Fight for your life. Experience the toughest battleground circumstances. Plan a strategy to escape the counter-terrorist strike and survive the mission. It’s going to be a hard time to escape the gunshot, landmines and diffusing them for your army men. The territory is protected by armed enemy soldiers, trained intelligence agents, spy and expert security team. Don’t let the enemy shoot you and imprison you. Now its time to start your stealth operations to get your city free from these enemy forces. Move as invisible as a predator. As a brave military army officer hero, you have been trained to escape the toughest of conditions and fight like a superhero. Fight like a ninja superhero, search for weapons to kill the enemy. Encounter terrorist, Kick, punch, shoot, attack and kill!

Call of Army Sniper: Sniper Shooter Battleground features:

- Smooth controls
- Third Person Shooting adventure
- Real battlefield action environment
- Survive Exciting war game missions
- Challenging FPS game survival missions
- Multiple weapons to use including real sniper gun
- Different locations to fight the terrorist organization
- Realistic terrorist encounter, fighting and shooting effects and guns noise sounds
